column1: Table 5.24: Total Cost Estimate for Stream Reservation Proposals

column3: Problem to be addressed   Recommendation

Moderate soil erosion of land on both sides (100m length). Recommend 1. Make dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Agave/Areca nut trees /Kithul/Kumbuk/Mee/ Godapara/Kaduru/Aththikka/Wal del/Kekuna /Mango/local fruits/randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid interval.2. Apply mulching, organic manure and NPK fertilizer. Covered area 200 m2.

column2: Minor stream across the Badulu road
column3: Moderate soil erosion of embankments (about 50m length). Recommend for both sides to plant single row of Areca nut seedling @ 1m spacing and gaps filled with Vetiver grass and maintain for 3 months until roots are established.
